name: The system should not allow to login with invalid password and throw error by redirecting into same login page

children.description: Given I am in the Login page
And I Enter my username suma.srinivasaiah@centelon.com.clos2
And I Enter my password Test@12345
When I Click on Login button
Then I should not be able to log into my Salesforce account and redirected to same login page by throwing error

userStory.storyName: Login into Salesforce account with valid username and invalid password

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I am in the Login page
And I Enter my username <username>
And I Enter my password <password>
And I Uncheck Remember me
When I Click on Login button
Then I should not be able to log into my Salesforce account and redirected to same login page by throwing error
